price: Tsammãninka kai mai zaka halakar da ranka ne, dõn ba su zamanto mũminai ba!
arabic: لَعَلَّكَ بَٰخِعٞ نَّفۡسَكَ أَلَّا يَكُونُواْ مُؤۡمِنِينَ
footnotes: * Wannan yã nũna cewa Annabi Muhammadu yanã jin tsõron rashin ĩmãnin mutãnensa, kada ya zama shĩ ne ya gajarta daga abin da Allah Ya ɗõra a kansa, na iyar da manzanci. Haka mũmini yake, kullum girman Ubangijinsa yake dũbi, sabõda haka kõme ya yi na ɗã'a, sai ya ga kãsãwar kansa ga tsayuwa da hakkin Ubangijinsa, a kansa, ya ƙãra jin tsõro da tawãli'u.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: laʿallaka bākhiʿun nafsaka allā yakūnū mu'minīna
